days.title: Day 1: Java Setup & First Program
days.focus: Environment setup, JDK vs JRE vs JVM, Hello World

tasks.title: Install JDK 11 or higher
tasks.description: Download from Oracle, set JAVA_HOME, verify installation

tasks.title: Setup IDE (IntelliJ IDEA recommended)
tasks.description: Install and configure IDE, create first project

tasks.title: Understand JDK, JRE, JVM differences
tasks.description: Learn architecture and how Java works

tasks.title: Write and run Hello World
tasks.description: Create main method, compile, and execute

practice.title: Hello World Variations
practice.description: Create 5 different Hello World programs with different outputs

practice.title: Print Pattern
practice.description: Print your name in a box pattern using asterisks
hints: Plan the pattern on paper first

resources.title: JDK vs JRE vs JVM - GeeksforGeeks

interviewQuestions: What is the difference between JDK, JRE, and JVM?
What is the role of ClassLoader?

days.title: Day 2: Variables & Data Types
days.focus: Primitive types, type casting, variable scope, naming conventions

tasks.title: Learn all 8 primitive data types
tasks.description: byte, short, int, long, float, double, char, boolean - sizes and ranges

tasks.title: Understand variable declaration and initialization
tasks.description: Different ways to declare and initialize variables

tasks.title: Follow naming conventions
tasks.description: camelCase for variables, UPPER_CASE for constants

practice.title: Data Type Explorer
practice.description: Create program showing size, min, max values of all primitive types
hints: Use wrapper classes like Byte, Integer

practice.title: Type Casting Practice
practice.description: Demonstrate implicit and explicit casting with examples
hints: double to int needs explicit cast

practice.title: Temperature Converter
practice.description: Convert Celsius to Fahrenheit and vice versa

interviewQuestions: What are the 8 primitive data types in Java?
What is the difference between int and Integer?
Explain implicit and explicit type casting
What is the default value of each primitive type?
What is the difference between float and double?
Can we change the value of a final variable?

standard.name: Standard Track (4-5 Months - 15-20 hrs/week)
standard.description: Balanced learning pace for working professionals

days.title: Day 1: Java Environment Setup
days.focus: Installing JDK, IDE, understanding Java ecosystem

tasks.title: Download and install JDK
tasks.description: Get latest LTS version from Oracle or OpenJDK

practice.title: First Java Program
practice.description: Create and run Hello World program

interviewQuestions: What is JDK and what does it contain?
Difference between JDK, JRE, and JVM?
What is the purpose of JAVA_HOME?
Explain Java's 'Write Once, Run Anywhere' principle

comfortable.name: Comfortable Track (6 Months - 10-15 hrs/week)
comfortable.description: Relaxed pace for beginners and students

days.title: Day 1: Introduction to Programming
days.focus: What is programming, why Java, career opportunities

tasks.title: Why choose Java
tasks.description: Understand Java's popularity and use cases

tasks.title: Career opportunities
tasks.description: Explore job roles: Developer, SDET, QA Automation

practice.title: Research Activity
practice.description: List 10 companies using Java in your city

interviewQuestions: What are the features of Java?
